titles.title: Relating to the death of the Honorable Frank R. Lautenberg, a Senator from the State of New Jersey.

action.text: Pending disposition of the measure, the Chair recognized Members of the New Jersey delegation to proceed with remarks to honor the late Senator Lautenberg.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/3/2013--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Frank R. Lautenberg, a Senator from New Jersey. Declares that when the House adjourns on June 3, 2013, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of the deceased Senator.
